name: record-deck
description: Smooth BLDC with a positional encoder, via a constant jerk model with input smoothing via a kalman filter, suitable for low to high (28k) rpm applications

scripts.simulate:bldc: npm run test:venv && bokeh serve --show tracking/simulating-duty-motor.py
scripts.simulate:double-pendulum: npm run test:venv && python datasets/process-double-pendulum.py ${npm_config_dataset} > datasets/data/double-pendulum/data${npm_config_dataset}.csv && bokeh serve --show tracking/pendulum-state-estimator.py --args ${npm_config_dataset}
scripts.cluster:zero-crossing: npm run test:venv && python3 calibration/zero-cross-cluster-data.py ${npm_config_dataset} ${npm_config_number_of_poles} kmedoids-clustered.json
scripts.cluster-inliers:zero-crossing: npm run test:venv && python3 calibration/zero-cross-cluster-data.py ${npm_config_dataset} ${npm_config_number_of_poles} kmedoids-clustered-inliers.json
scripts.inspect:zero-crossing: npm run test:venv && python3 calibration/zero-cross-inspect.py ${npm_config_dataset} False
scripts.inspect-inliers:zero-crossing: npm run test:venv && python3 calibration/zero-cross-inspect.py ${npm_config_dataset} True
scripts.update:venv-deps: npm run test:venv && pip3 freeze > pip.freeze
